      • runProcess

        public static java.lang.Process runProcess(java.lang.String[] args,
                                           java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        runs commandline process
        Parameters:
        args - e.g. "doit arg1 ..."
        inputStream - CONFUSING! this is copied into the outputStream of the proc (which is actually the input to the proc) "returns the output stream connected to the normal input of the subprocess. Output to the stream is piped into the standard input of the process represented by this Process object."
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
